gpt_comment: Paris is set for a sunny day with averages around 30.6°C, peaking at 35°C, and a minimal chance of rain. Meteoblue aligns, indicating around the same temperatures and virtually no precipitation. Ideal for a stroll down the Seine, but don't forget your water bottle - it's going to be a hot one!
